text:
Kazimierz Pawełek (21 February 1936 – 3 December 2017) was a Polish journalist and politician. He served in the Polish Senate from 2001 to 2005 as a member of the Democratic Left Alliance – Labour Union. In the 1970s, he became the editor of "Głos Budowlanych". He also worked for the newspapers "Dziennik Polski" and "Kurier Lubelski". He was born in Bochnia.
Pawełek died on 3 December 2017, at the age of 81.
